triplets: Container designed to hold liquids, granular materials, or other goods, available in various sizes and shapes
Storing, transporting, and handling liquids, grains, chemicals, or other goods in domestic, industrial, or agricultural contexts
Wood, plastic, metal, or composite materials depending on intended use and durability requirements

Body or shell that forms the main container for holding materials

Varies depending on material, size, and whether empty or filled
